title: anudinamum unnai
sahitya:
anudinamum unnai aNugip-paNiyum ennai aNaiya vENum ayyanE anuvAvik-kumaraiyanE


anupallavi

  paNiya varum aDiyAr iDar maraiyavE tuNai purindu varum dInadayAparanE


caraNam    aruvip-punal angu peruguvadaip-pOlavE aruL unadum peruga aDiyEn adaip-peTru
perumidam urum oru pErinbam uTriDa karuNai kUra vENum kArtikEyanE
